subject: Re: >>>Note to ALL: Convert your WAV files to MP3<<
author: LC Duplatt
full_text:
Hi, Misty.  

I am deleting some of my files, but is there a file size that is 
appropriate?  Though I posted audio in .wav files, they actually seem 
pretty small in file size.  I do not have time to convert these and 
wonder if they are OK the way they are?  

Please advise...  :)

LC


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Misty" <bulletbabea@...> wrote:
>
> Hello all. It's that time again for me to remind you that the group 
> is low on space (96% used) and actions will be taken. For now 
rather 
> than delete everyones files I am asking that you convert your wav 
> format into mp3 or smaller format before you post them to the files 
> area.
> 
> One member using 10+ megs out of our groups 100 total megs just 
isnt 
> going to fly anymore. So starting in May all files that are not 
> within size limits and arent in smallest formats will have to start 
> to get deleted.
> 
> For those who cant convert your files I have programs that are free 
> to help you do that. For those that dont want to convert your 
files, 
> you can use esnips to post your larger files and share them with 
the 
> group as links in posts. For those that ignore my posts and do what 
> you want to anyway, your stuff will be deleted and your option to 
> upload and share here in group will be disabled.
> 
> As I said we have 100 (one hundred) megs total in file section for 
> sharing, please do not abuse your share of that space. As you can 
see 
> there are others who like to share too. Eventually we may just 
clean 
> it out of everyones files but for now lets try and stick to 
> compacting the things we upload and make use of places like esnips 
> for sharing.
> 
> Misty
>
